'''Scholar's Quill Pen''' is an [[Artifact]] in the set [[Scholar]].

==Description==
The scholar's quill pen is made from the feather of an exotic bird.<br />After an enormous amount of writing, the feather has been stained black.<br />In all her years, the scholar never thought of changing her stained quill pen for a new one.<br />Just as an old soldier feels most at ease with his own weapon, the scholar needed her familiar quill pen.
